sentences.en: And to do right by our vets, we’re working to prevent and end veteran homelessness –because in the United States of America, no one who served in our uniform should sleep on our streets.
sentences.cn: 为公平对待我们的退伍军人，我们正在为避免和结束退伍军人无家可归的状态而努力——因为在美利坚合众国，不能有任何一个曾为国家服务的军人睡在大街上。

sentences.en: Five decades later, Nian , 76, is on the verge of homelessness.
sentences.cn: 50年后, 现年 76岁的年世福却到了无家可归的地步.

sentences.en: For a growing number of young people, homelessness is becoming a way of life.
sentences.cn: 对日渐成长的年轻族群, 四海为家是生活的方式之一.

sentences.en: Hunger and homelessness are dangers to humanity.
sentences.cn: 饥饿和无家可归人类面临的危险.

sentences.en: I intend to forgive those ancestors who experienced homelessness and struggled as a result.
sentences.cn: 我想要去谅解那些体验了无家可归和挣扎的祖先们.

sentences.en: The majority of people who experience homelessness really just need some affordable housing help.
sentences.cn: 大多数无家可归的人需要的仅仅是住房补贴.

sentences.en: The material and physical suffering is suffering from hunger, from homelessness, from all kinds of diseases.
sentences.cn: 物质和身体上的苦难是从饥饿来的, 从无家可归来的, 从各种疾病来的.

sentences.en: The only way to solve homelessness is to provide more homes.
sentences.cn: 解决无家可归唯一的方法就是提供更多住所.

sentences.en: These are the days of dispossession, the season of homelessness, the time of evictions.
sentences.cn: 现在是强占豪夺的日子, 是无家可归的季节, 是被撵出家门的时候.

sentences.en: To the man sleeping regularly in doorways homelessness is real.
sentences.cn: 常常睡在通道中的人其实就是无家可归.

sentences.en: We wanted to have kids, but I don’t feel like I can stop working because I’m funding all this. Growing up with homelessness, I know the consequences of stopping working.
sentences.cn: 我们都很喜欢孩子，但是，我因为我承担着家里的一切开支，我认为我不能辞掉工作，我是在无家可归的环境下长大的，我知道停止工作的后果”。

sentences.en: We’d be unhappy if we couldn’t pay for our Quality of Life priorities, but not in danger of homelessness.
sentences.cn: 如果金钱无法改善我们的生活,我们当然会很不开心，但是不要为此而冒着可能无家可归的风险。

words.tran_cn: 舒适的，自在的；如在家的
家庭的；平凡的；不好看的
舒适的；家庭似的；自在的
回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的
家，住宅；产地；家乡；避难所
